text: Amber's Drive is a high-energy country group with an R&B; vibe. The band consists of Denny Rudolph, Jim Huish and Daniel Swartz. Formed in September 2013, they are a band that has blended Pop, R&B;, Country, and Blues to create their own unique style. ==History== Jim and Daniel have been performing together for 4 years, and have recorded 2 EP's under the Amber's Drive name. Jim had a viral video in 2015. It has over 6 million views on YouTube, over 100 million total views on the web, and has been featured on shows such as Fox and Friends and Right This Minute. ==References== ==External links== *Official Website *Reverb Nation Profile *Facebook page *Jim Huish's viral video Category:Musical groups from Tennessee Category:Americana music groups Category:American musical trios Category:Musical groups established in 2013
title: Amber's Drive
